home.title: Atelier Archilles
home.subtitle: Where Light Meets Artistry
home.description: Premier photography studio offering world-class facilities for photographers, artists, and creatives.

about.heading: We're here to capture moments that transcend time, and create spaces where creativity flourishes.
about.description1: is a premier photography studio offering world-class facilities for photographers, artists, and creatives. From intimate portrait sessions to bold fashion shoots - we provide the canvas for your vision.
about.description2: Founded with a passion for the craft, Atelier Archilles is where technical excellence meets artistic freedom. Our studios are designed to inspire, equipped to deliver, and ready to elevate your work.

closing.text1: We believe in spaces that inspire - environments where technical mastery and creative freedom converge to produce extraordinary work.
closing.text2: This is photography elevated. This is Atelier Archilles.

studioA.title: Studio A — The Portrait Sanctuary
studioA.description1: Our flagship studio, designed for intimate portrait work and creative experimentation. Natural light floods through oversized windows, while professional lighting rigs offer infinite control.
studioA.description2: Perfect for headshots, fashion editorials, and artistic portraits that demand both precision and soul.

studioB.title: Studio B — Product Perfection
studioB.description1: Clean, minimal, and endlessly versatile. Studio B is engineered for product photography and commercial work that demands pixel-perfect results.
studioB.description2: Professional seamless backdrops, precision lighting, and ample space for elaborate setups. Your products deserve to shine.

studioC.title: Studio C — Fashion Forward
studioC.description1: The largest of our spaces, built for movement, drama, and grand visions. High ceilings, expansive floor area, and professional-grade equipment make this the perfect stage for fashion shoots and large productions.
studioC.description2: From runway-inspired editorials to avant-garde concepts - this is where bold ideas come to life.

makeup.title: Makeup Studio — Beauty Refined
makeup.description1: A dedicated space for hair and makeup artistry. Professional mirrors, perfect lighting, and all the amenities needed to prepare for your shoot.
makeup.description2: Complete with styling stations and comfortable seating - the ideal preparation space for models, clients, and creative teams.
